name: Time Wanderer (Hexadoos_)
description:
Made by Filoma, Porfavormark, and Hexadoos:

Our main idea for the game is to allow players themselves feel the part of the story. In
game, you are robot, which woke up in the past and ends up wandering into mysterious
fantasy world, trying to get clues of what happend, with a mission to regain it’s lost
memories.
